articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Bile scores career-high 22 in Northwestern State's 71-66 win
articles.description: SAN ANTONIO, Texas (AP) — Chudier Bile scored a career-high 22 points plus 12 rebounds as Northwestern State snapped its seven-game road losing streak, beating Incarnate Word 71-66 on Wednesday night.
articles.content:
SAN ANTONIO, Texas (AP) Chudier Bile scored a career-high 22 points plus 12 rebounds as Northwestern State snapped its seven-game road losing streak, beating Incarnate Word 71-66 on Wednesday night.
Bile hit 11 of 13 from the free throw line and 5-for-8 from… [+1103 chars]

articles.title: Goodwin lifts Saint Louis over George Washington 63-58
articles.description: ST. LOUIS (AP) — Jordan Goodwin had 20 points as Saint Louis stretched its home win streak to seven games, narrowly defeating George Washington 63-58 on Wednesday night.
articles.content:
ST. LOUIS (AP) Jordan Goodwin had 20 points as Saint Louis stretched its home win streak to seven games, narrowly defeating George Washington 63-58 on Wednesday night.

articles.title: Berzat, Myers carry New Orleans past Cent. Arkansas 86-78
articles.description: NEW ORLEANS (AP) — Lamont Berzat had 18 points to lead six New Orleans players in double figures as the Privateers topped Central Arkansas 86-78 on Wednesday night. Jahmel Myers added 17 points for the Privateers. Gerrale Gates chipped in…

articles.title: Smith, Talton lift Texas A&M-CC past Stephen F. Austin 73-72
articles.description: NACOGDOCHES, Texas (AP) — Peyton Smith led a balanced attack with 12 points and Jashawn Talton blocked an attempted layup at the buzzer and Texas A&M-Corpus Christi held on to eat Stephen F. Austin 73-72 on Wednesday night.
articles.content:
NACOGDOCHES, Texas (AP) Peyton Smith led a balanced attack with 12 points and Jashawn Talton blocked an attempted layup at the buzzer and Texas A&M-Corpus Christi held on to eat Stephen F. Austin 73-72 on Wednesday night.

articles.author: By JOE KAY AP Sports Writer
articles.title: Powell scores 24, surging Seton Hall beats Xavier 83-71
articles.description: CINCINNATI (AP) — Myles Powell scored 24 points Wednesday night, and Seton Hall remained undefeated in the Big East by beating Xavier 83-71, snapping the Musketeers' streak of 13 straight home wins.
articles.content:
The Pirates led 40-32 at halftime, the most points Xavier has allowed in an opening half this season. Seton Hall's pair of 7-foot-2 centers took away Xavier's drives to the basket Ike Obiagu blocked three shots and Romaro Gill finished with five blocks.

articles.title: Wheeler leads Jets to 4-3 shootout win over Maple Leafs
articles.description: TORONTO (AP) — Blake Wheeler scored the winner in the shootout and the Winnipeg Jets beat the Maple Leafs 4-3 on Wednesday night, spoiling a milestone performance by Toronto's Auston Matthews.

articles.title: No. 7 San Diego State beats Wyoming 72-52 to stay undefeated
articles.description: LARAMIE, Wyo. (AP) — Malachi Flynn scored 19 points, Yanni Wetzell added 17 and No. 7 San Diego State beat Wyoming 72-52 on Wednesday night to remain undefeated.
